articles.title: Understanding Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing
articles.abstract: This paper provides an overview of deep learning techniques applied to natural language processing tasks, such as text classification, sentiment analysis, and machine translation.

articles.title: Sentiment Analysis Using Machine Learning Techniques
articles.abstract: In this research, we explore various machine learning algorithms, such as Naive Bayes, Support Vector Machines, and Decision Trees, for sentiment analysis on product reviews and social media posts.
articles.source: International Journal of Data Science and Analytics

articles.title: Efficient Text Summarization with Transformer Models
articles.abstract: This article presents a novel approach to abstractive text summarization using transformer-based models, including BERT and GPT-3, which significantly outperforms existing techniques.
articles.source: Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems

articles.title: Topic Modeling in Large-scale Text Corpora
articles.abstract: We introduce a scalable and efficient topic modeling technique based on Latent Dirichlet Allocation for analyzing large-scale text corpora, demonstrating its effectiveness in various domains such as news articles, research papers, and social media data.
